questions.question: The average of five numbers is 20. If one number is removed, the average becomes 18. What is the removed number?
questions.explanation: Sum of five numbers = 5 × 20 = 100. Sum of four numbers = 4 × 18 = 72. Removed number = 100 - 72 = 26

questions.question: The average age of a group of 10 people is 25 years. If a person aged 35 years joins the group, what is the new average age?
questions.explanation: Sum of ages of 10 people = 10 × 25 = 250. New sum = 250 + 35 = 285. New average = 285 ÷ 11 = 26 years

questions.question: The average of three numbers is 15. If one number is 10, what is the average of the other two numbers?
questions.explanation: Sum of three numbers = 3 × 15 = 45. Sum of other two numbers = 45 - 10 = 35. Average of other two numbers = 35 ÷ 2 = 17.5

questions.question: The average weight of 6 students is 50 kg. If the weight of one student is 60 kg, what is the average weight of the remaining students?
questions.explanation: Sum of weights of 6 students = 6 × 50 = 300 kg. Sum of weights of remaining 5 students = 300 - 60 = 240 kg. Average weight of remaining students = 240 ÷ 5 = 48 kg

questions.question: The average of four numbers is 12. If three of the numbers are 10, 12, and 14, what is the fourth number?
questions.explanation: Sum of four numbers = 4 × 12 = 48. Sum of three numbers = 10 + 12 + 14 = 36. Fourth number = 48 - 36 = 12

questions.question: The average score of a student in five tests is 80. If the highest score is 100, what is the minimum possible score in any of the tests?
questions.explanation: Sum of five scores = 5 × 80 = 400. If one score is 100, the sum of the other four scores = 400 - 100 = 300. Minimum possible score = 0, but this would make the average less than 80. So, minimum score = 20

questions.question: The average age of a family of five members is 30 years. If the youngest member is 10 years old, what is the average age of the other four members?
questions.explanation: Sum of ages of five members = 5 × 30 = 150. Sum of ages of other four members = 150 - 10 = 140. Average age of other four members = 140 ÷ 4 = 32.5 years

questions.question: The average of six numbers is 18. If one number is 24, what is the average of the other five numbers?
questions.explanation: Sum of six numbers = 6 × 18 = 108. Sum of other five numbers = 108 - 24 = 84. Average of other five numbers = 84 ÷ 5 = 16.8

questions.question: The average height of 8 students is 160 cm. If the height of one student is 180 cm, what is the average height of the remaining students?
questions.explanation: Sum of heights of 8 students = 8 × 160 = 1280 cm. Sum of heights of remaining 7 students = 1280 - 180 = 1100 cm. Average height of remaining students = 1100 ÷ 7 = 157.5 cm

questions.question: The average of five numbers is 25. If four of the numbers are 20, 25, 30, and 35, what is the fifth number?
questions.explanation: Sum of five numbers = 5 × 25 = 125. Sum of four numbers = 20 + 25 + 30 + 35 = 110. Fifth number = 125 - 110 = 15
